type.markdownDescription:
### `apoli:status_effect`
Checks whether the entity has a specified status effect with a specified amplifier, and/or duration range.
## Entity Condition Type
Entity Condition Types operate on an Entity, which also allows access to the world. These are available to be used in most powers in the condition object field (or entity_condition in other power/condition types), which restricts when a power is active.

[Entity Condition Types Documentation](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_Condition_types/)

effect.description: The namespace and ID of the status effect to check for.s

min_amplifier.description: The minimum amplifier the status effect should have in order to pass the check.

max_amplifier.description: The maximum amplifier the status effect should have in order to pass the check.

min_duration.description: The minimum duration in ticks the status effect should have left in order to pass the check.

max_duration.description: The maximum duration in ticks the status effect should have left in order to pass the check.
